title: Convenience users like Vegetable market, Meat market, Fish market, Barber shop, Grocery shop, Milk Booth, Telephone Booth, Newspaper and Book stall, Stationery shop, Utility shop, Tailor shop, Canteen, Tea Stall etc
clause_text: Convenience users like Vegetable market, Meat market, Fish market, Barber shop, Grocery shop, Milk Booth, Telephone Booth, Newspaper and Book stall, Stationery shop, Utility shop, Tailor shop, Canteen, Tea Stall etc. shall be permissible in these shops.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Convenience users like Vegetable market, Meat market, Fish market, Barber shop, Grocery shop, Milk Booth, Telephone Booth, Newspaper and Book stall, Stationery shop, Utility shop, Tailor shop, Canteen
